text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Nocturnal. Steals non-heavy Metal/Electronic objects from Zombies, except obstacles, then has to recharge.
$(br2)$(#bd951a)Magnetism is a powerful force. Very powerful. Sometimes it scares Magnet-shroom a little. He's not sure if he can handle that kind of responsibility.

pages.title: ‚≠ê Specials
pages.text: $(#25228d)Magnet-shrooms remove helmets and other metal objects from zombies.
